entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 7:33 PM MDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
